argumentText:
ARGUMENT
z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_mptresid | |- ( z e. CC |-> z ) = ( _I |` CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_exp1 | |- ( z e. CC -> ( z ^ 1 ) = z ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_mpteq2ia | |- ( z e. CC |-> ( z ^ 1 ) ) = ( z e. CC |-> z ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-idp | |- Xp = ( _I |` CC ) |
| 5 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_3eqtr4ri | |- Xp = ( z e. CC |-> ( z ^ 1 ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_1nn0 | |- 1 e. NN0 |
| 7 |  | #P_plypow | |- ( ( S C_ CC /\ 1 e. S /\ 1 e. NN0 ) -> ( z e. CC |-> ( z ^ 1 ) ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mp3an3 | |- ( ( S C_ CC /\ 1 e. S ) -> ( z e. CC |-> ( z ^ 1 ) ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ( S C_ CC /\ 1 e. S ) -> Xp e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
